timeline.message:
:bug: Upgrade Schema Vertex Types
* Adding certain nodes to a v1 graph opened in v2 will introduce duplicate types. This is because the Type have changed (which is the validation and detection regex).

timeline.bodyText: Sonar is identifying using double brace initialisation as a bug. Consequently, it would be good to remove the need to use it
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: This will probably work just fine, but could be improved by comparing more of the type object than just the name.
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText: Perhaps @cygnus-x-1 though remember that this is upgrading from v3 so we should be safe to assume what the type is at this point.
replies.author: arcturus2
